---
title: "co2_belchatowPl"
output: pdf_document
---

```{r setup}
library(downscaling)
```


```{r define_downscaled_datanames}
save_dir <- normalizePath("../tmp/", winslash = '/', mustWork = T)

tg_belchatowPl_xco2 <- downscaling::target_datanames(
  product = "L2StdTG",
  targetname = "belchatowPl",
  column = "XCO2_ppm",
  targetdate = c("220313", "220324", "220721"),
  resolution_m = c(250, 500),
  lambda = c(1, 5, 10, 15, 50)
)
```

```{r clean_downscaled}
downscaling::cleaner(tg_belchatowPl_xco2, save_dir = save_dir, 
                     delN = T, delG = T, 
                     delPG = F, del2D = F, 
                     dryrun = T)
```

```{r generate_downscaled, warning=TRUE, include=FALSE}
for (idx in 1:nrow(tg_belchatowPl_xco2) ) {
  downscaling::generator(tg_belchatowPl_xco2[idx, ], save_dir = save_dir)
}
```
